title: ACOTAR Characters
description: How well do you know the characters of Prythian?

questions.question: Who is the High Lord of the Night Court?
questions.explanation: Rhysand (Rhys) is the powerful High Lord of the Night Court and Feyre's mate.

questions.question: How many sisters does Feyre have?
questions.explanation: Feyre has two older sisters: Nesta and Elain Archeron.

questions.question: Tamlin is the High Lord of the Spring Court.
questions.explanation: Tamlin rules the Spring Court and is Feyre's love interest in the first book.

questions.question: Who is Feyre's true mate?
questions.explanation: Rhysand is revealed to be Feyre's true mate, the person destined for her by the Cauldron.

questions.question: What are Cassian, Azriel, and Rhysand known as?
questions.explanation: The Inner Circle is Rhysand's trusted group of friends and advisors, including the Illyrian warriors.

questions.question: Who is the Shadowsinger of the Night Court?
questions.explanation: Azriel is the Shadowsinger, a rare Illyrian who can control shadows and serves as spymaster.

questions.question: Lucien was originally from the Spring Court.
questions.explanation: Lucien was born in the Autumn Court as a son of the High Lord Beron, but fled to Spring Court.

questions.question: Who is Amren?

options.text: An ancient being trapped in a Fae body

questions.explanation: Amren is an ancient, powerful being from another world who was trapped in a Fae form.
